Room.Name: Eidenhoft Boulevard
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Eidenhoft Boulevard, running northeast to southwest.
Room.LongDescription: Eidenhoft Boulevard cuts through a large city block. On the south side of the road, there are three shops: Batton Locks & Picks, Dragonwares and Leomund's Water Purification. The entrances to these shops is probably on Oceancrest Drive or Waterfront Way, but there might be a rear entrance to some of these buildings here.
